Students & Interns

While working at Yandex Research, I supervised undergraduate/master students in the scope of Yandex Academic Supervision Program, and NLP research interns at Yandex Research.

The team:

  • Dmitrii Emelianenko: NeurIPS 2019, ACL 2020 (BPE-dropout)
  • Ivan Provilkov: ACL 2020 (BPE-dropout)
  • Maksim Ryabinin: a very cool paper which will be here soon :)
  • Fedor Moiseev: ACL 2019 paper

Natural Language Processing
overview

Natural Language Processing

I coordinate and teach Natural Language Processing together with my colleagues from the Yandex Translate team David Talbot, Boris Kovarsky, Sergey Gubanov and Just Heuristic. This is a second-year course offered to Master-level students at the Yandex School of Data Analysis.
